name: kinto
description: An Offline-First JavaScript client for Kinto.

scripts.build-demo: mkdirp dist && npm run dist-prod && cpy --rename=kinto.js dist/kinto.min.js demo
scripts.dist: rimraf dist && npm run dist-dev && npm run dist-prod && npm run dist-noshim && npm run dist-fx
scripts.dist-fx:
cross-env BABEL_ENV=firefox webpack && mkdirp dist && cpy --rename=moz-kinto-offline-client.js fx-src/jsm_prefix.js dist && echo "
/*
 * Version $npm_package_version - $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
 */
" >> dist/moz-kinto-offline-client.js && cat temp.jsm >> dist/moz-kinto-offline-client.js && rimraf temp.jsm
scripts.compute-sri:
version=$(npm view kinto version); printf "| Filename %-14s | Hash %-66s |
" "" "(for version $version)"; printf "|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
"; cd dist; for file in kinto*.js; do printf "| %-23s | %-71s |
" ${file} $(echo -n 'sha384-' && curl --silent https://unpkg.com/kinto@$version/dist/${file} | openssl dgst -sha384 -binary | openssl enc -base64); done
scripts.publish-demo: npm run dist-prod && cpy dist/kinto.js demo && gh-pages -d demo
scripts.publish-to-npm: npm run dist && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-nocover
scripts.test-cover: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test babel-istanbul cover --report text $npm_package_config_ISTANBUL_OPTS mocha -- --require babel-register --require ./test/_setup.js 'test/**/*_test.js'
scripts.test-cover-html: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test babel-istanbul cover --report html $npm_package_config_ISTANBUL_OPTS mocha -- --require babel-register --require ./test/_setup.js 'test/**/*_test.js' && echo 'Coverage report generated in coverage/index.html'

author: Mozilla <contact@mozilla.com>
